resources.string: Completed on-campus studies and currently taking distance education courses to complete a Master\'s Degree in Computer Science (Available for full-time W2 employment).

Language: Java, Spring Boot, MySQL, AWS, 
Frameworks/web: Spring(Boot, MVC, Security), Hibernate, JDBC 
Microservices/Cloud: AWS, GCP, Docker, Kubernetes, Kafka 
Databases: Oracle, PL/SQL, MySQL, MongoDB 
Tools: Intellij IDE, Maven, GitHub, GitLab, UML

An enthusiastic individual who is seeking a placement position to enable skills to be utilized.Reliable Java Developer with 4 years of professional experience administering projects through all phases of the software development life cycle. Streamline backend development, application integration, and technical support while improving performance and functionality. Skilled in using technologies such as Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, MySQL, IntelliJ, REST API, Git, and Jira.
